SysFileTruncate (FUN)
SysFileTruncate (FUN)
Â¶
FUNCTION SysFileTruncate : RTS_IEC_RESULT
Set a new filesize. May be larger or smaller than current size.
InOut:
Scope
Name
Type
Comment
Return
SysFileTruncate
RTS_IEC_RESULT
Returns the runtime system error code (see
CmpErrors.library)
Input
hFile
RTS_IEC_HANDLE
Handle of the file
ulSizeNew
__XWORD
Size to set.
